artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Orange & yellow warp. Green, tan & metallic copper form weft. Bands of color in weft. All 4 sides machine edged. (orange, green, tan, yellow, copper metallic)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Pomegranate%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1953
title: Pomegranate
